/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, green, and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Trees and street lamps punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape.
